description:
Serpent is a powerful S rank http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] goes around hunting down and killing http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG] http://anidb.net/t7112 [investigators] as well as other ghouls. He seems to have a great dislike towards both CCG and http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri Tree] commenting that they are the same and disgusting for creating "fake" ghouls.
His kagune is a tail-like formation that wraps around his leg and enhances the strength of his kicks beyond those of his rank.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Orochi
